name: Teresa Smith
text: Here they have really good brick fired pizza's, appetizers and much more,  they offer outside dining, inside dining or sit at the bar...restrooms are in order & clean...May you leave happy and full...as we did üòäThe SmithClan

name: Terri Leigh Marchbanks
text: I ordered out using Door Dash tonight, and even though I order MM frequently, tonight was out of this world! It‚Äôs always good which is why I‚Äôm a repeat customer but tonight was extra delicious. I almost called the store to tell them how yummy it was. Decided it was better to go leave them a review. Highly recommended from me.

name: Ashley Woolwine
text: I have eaten pizza all over the country and I can't find a better pizza then at Mellow Mushroom. I don't know what they do to their crust but it is amazing and the quality of ingredients and toppings is so apparent. If you haven't tried the Thai pizza do it!

name: Charles Shuford
text: All good tonight. Service was prompt; price was reasonable; and the pizza was delicious

name: Dawn Wilson
text: Its an ok place. But they give you a paper straw to save the environment, which taste nasty, then turn around and put your leftovers in a Big Plastic container!  But they're saving the world one paper straw at a time! Smdh...

name: TheLightemup2
text: We were seated around 7:20, after waiting nearly 43 minutes,we were told that we still had around a 15 minute wait for our food. We ordered two pizzas. Ridiculously long wait, although the food is usually pretty good.

name: Kristy Lancaster
text: MM was at 50% capacity because of Covid. I went inside and placed a to go order because we wanted to sit outside at the picnic tables. They were out of artichoke hearts which we were told but when the pizza arrived there were no pepperoni, ‚Ä¶More

name: Kym Cherry
text: Perhaps the best Mellow Mushroom I've been to in decades?! The food was very good, the staff took very good care of my vegan friend, the dining floor is spacious and clean. The facilities were also clean and modern. I would most certainly return to this establishment in the future.

name: Frank Kokay
text: Went to Mellow Mushroom and they are way two mellow!! Took over an hour for our order to be served. Appearantly they care more about the take out orders rather then the dolls who dine in!!!!

name: James 'Jimmy' Stiff
text: Best pizza in town period. Salads are great. Plus the bar is excellent and they also have a frozen Jack n Coke machine, yep.

name: Jeffrey Wilkerson
text: Great atmosphere and super welcoming service. The menu was fresh and delightful. Will absolutely recommend this spot to anyone. Reasonable prices and generous meals. Good job.

name: Sean Oleasz
text: The pretzel bites with beer cheese is my favorite appetizer in Clemson. I think their thin crust pies are fantastic, but personally i think the thick crust ends up a bit bland. Fantastic ambience and decor, with a full bar and room to watch the game.

name: tracy hendrix
text: I just think it's a little pricey and there should be 4 meatballs instead of 3..overall it's very very delicious.

name: Steven Collier
text: The most gorgeous women ive seen in a place of business, wow, the food was greag too.

name: Teresa Waldrop
text: The food is always delicious! White pie! Yum! Scrumptious fresh salads! Fresh made dough! Full bar! Great atmosphere!

name: B KM
text: Visiting from out of town. To my surprise I was able to find a restaurant that offered vegan options. I ordered the vegan tempeh hoagie and it was delicious.

name: Madison Stegall
text: I don't see what all the hype is about honestly. Wasn't that impressed with it

name: Kristopher Thorpe
text: Out of all the mellow mushrooms I've been to this one was probably the best. Fun staff great food and very informative.

name: Steven Snyder
text: Good service, clean restaurant, and very good pizza. In my opinion it is rather pricey at $20 for a medium 6 slice specialty pizza.

name: mariah davis
text: Ordered thru doordash, very yummy

name: Robyn Lloyd
text: Delicious! Great food with lots of options (appetizers, entrees, desserts, drinks, and alcohol). Great service. Nice location. Abundant seating. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tara Tampa1959
text: Best customer service from Emily ... Delicious Greek Salad and Veg Pizza

name: Jim Davidson
text: I miss the old mellow mushroom in Clemson. I make it a point to go to mellow in every town I visit. It‚Äôs a staple of most college towns in the south and I have been to many over the years. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tierra Harris
text: Made an online order for a personal pizza with Meatballs, peppers, onions, and olives. They didn't put the onions on and because I'm technology challenged I accidentally put meatballs on only half. I called them up and Cassidy and her manager hooked me up with a new pizza! GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE

name: Scott Johnson
text: Not a typical Pizza place.  Nice decor , atmosphere, and food.  Reasonable price for what you get.

name: Everett Pearson
text: The pizza was great and so was the service!

name: Dillon Martin
text: One of my favorite places to eat in Clemson. Good pizza at reasonable prices, nice atmosphere and interesting decor. If you get seated in the main room during a busy time it can be kind of loud, but seating in a side area is always pleasant.

name: David Wilkes
text: Very nice. Have options for us as Vegan. Had excellent service from Izzy. She was there just the right amount of time. Often servers are never around and are Missing In Action. Otherwise they are there every two seconds. She though was perfect. We had an excellent meal with our big family.

name: John Garner
text: We eat here every weekend and it is always great ! Good prices. no bar room drunks and the service is always great.  Tyler and Shyvanda at the bar are awesome.  Good place to enjoy a drink,  a great meal and perfect service.  I highly recommend this place  .

name: David Havener
text: Very good friendly service.

name: Marty Mccollum
text: Awesome best one by farüëç

name: Alex Fink
text: Typical Mellow Mushroom fare and a large selection of craft beer, but rather expensive as far as pizza in Clemson is concerned. ‚Ä¶More

name: Maximo Phelps
text: two days ago was the first time in this restaurant. But It is definitely not the last time. We passed a splendid evening with the excellent service, with the fine cooking and fine drinks and with the honest charge. We will surely return there in a short time.

name: Jerry Stevens
text: Nice place for lunch.

name: Ralph McKnight
text: Best tasting pizza ever!

name: Kimberley Millwater
text: Nice to have new places to go, Service was great! But, to be honest, it‚Äôs overpriced for a small pizza. Flavor.. not grand! I maybe the wrong person to give my opinion due to the fact I am from Boston & well Pizza is One of my favorites! This did nothing for me!

name: Todd Emsley
text: Best pizza I ever had!

name: Joy Smith
text: Great pizza and service.  Came in 25 minutes before closing time.  Staff was very nice and didn't try to hurry us through our meal.  Will go again!

name: R Maddox
text: From the moment  you step in this restaurant  the waiters give you a comfortable feeling. Very courteous hosts, it is a kind place to to go out with your friends or with your date. enjoyable  cooking, talented  chief cook and stuff, decent  price and professional  service. Highly recommended.

name: Jonathan Roberts
text: Food was great.  Seemed to be a little under staffed.   AR tender was our waiter so getting drinks took a bit.  Plenty of room, lots of TV's, food was quick and hot.  Got to have a jack Daniels slushy

name: obryan shoun
text: Love the taste. But 3 of my family were throwing up and had the runs after eating carryout from here. And all 3 of us have Or had cast iron stomachs. Totally miserable for least 4 hours or more.

name: Elaine Moyer
text: Came to visit relatives in Salem and had lunch here.  We had wings, pizza and pretzel bites.  All were out of this world.  Highly recommend trying for yourself.  You wont  be disappointed

name: Michele Carpenter
text: Their food is so fresh!!

name: Bryan Sosebee
text: Had the burger with tots and it was surprisingly good. Waitress was very nice and attentive. I think her name was Juliette.

name: david graham
text: Love their Greek salad especially because they will substitute blue cheese for feta! Very fresh. Mushroom soup is spectacular. Other menu items I've had have exceeded my expectations for a chain restaurant.

name: P. L. Chiles
text: It took 50 minutes to get two small pizzas at 11am

name: Christina McLean
text: Lovely people, delicious food, strong drinks, cool atmosphere. Gluten free pizza!

name: Cindi Cummings
text: My vegetable calzone was delicious. Friendly service. Great place for lunch.

name: Jeff Browning
text: Awesome! Finally back in Clemson, and they rocked it on their first day. Met the FOH manager, Keith, he seemed like a pretty cool dude. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jose Soto
text: Great food n service...

name: Johnny Boggs
text: Good food good service. The price is a little high need more special offers  for seniors

name: Trista Ashley
text: Loved the pretzel bites! Drinks were great! Shavonda was great too! Wish the bar stools weren't so uncomfortableüò¢

name: Darian Joyner
text: Nice place great service the Thai wings are a great app

name: Felicia Robinson
text: Our server was the bartender & she was PHENOMENAL!!! The problem is food service was painfully slow & they were not crowded. I was in a party of 2 and my son's food came out long before mine. When my burger FINALLY arrived ( after my top ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Landis
text: Very nice eating!

name: James Womack
text: Not too loud, not too busy... Just right, on a Saturday night! I had a specialty pizza that usually comes with tomato sauce and Roma tomatoes, but skipped the Romas and had it with a garlic and oil sauce instead (I love tomatoes, but they don't like me very much). They made it my way with no hassle and it was delicious!

name: Spencer Christensen
text: Ordered two calzones with two salads tonight and one calzone was supposed to be WITHOUT peppers, onions, ricotta and mushrooms. Not only was the calzone loaded with onions, one of our salads didn‚Äôt have any croutons. Very disappointing ‚Ä¶More

name: Cavonna Holcomb
text: Great place for pizza!  Our server was especially attentive.  We ordered a frozen Jack and Coke but we noticed that we didn't taste any Jack.  Our server then discovered that no Jack had been put in the drink and fixed a the problem by ‚Ä¶More

name: Alpha Dale
text: Awesome restaurant and staff. The Jack and Cherry Coke slushies were amazing as well!

name: Branden Baker
text: Excellent pizza! Try it if you haven't already!

name: Brady Decker
text: Love the atmosphere here, though I only ever pop in for a pie to go while road tripping.  Vegan options are excellent, but be aware that not all of the tofu and seitan options (they have several flavors) are vegan.  One of the few places ‚Ä¶More

name: Bree Harrison
text: Every time I go, I get the same thing and every time they manage to mess it up

name: Drew Bledsoe
text: Pizza cost more then expected, but most family pizza places would be about the same, pizza was really good, will definitely keep me coming back, and they also have a great beer and cocktail selection

name: Thomas Buchmann
text:
Service is great, but the food is even better.
Remember to try the Pretzels with Beer Cheese! They're the shroom's best kept secret!

name: Pete Spadetti
text: Great atmosphere, great pizza!  The kids love the pretzel bites! I love the beer!

name: Brad Mackiewicz
text: Mighty Meaty! Great food & open atmosphere..

name: David Dewey
text: A fabulous pizza place...and more. Great menu, extensive beverage offering, and reasonable prices. I'm going back!!

name: Karmin Andrew
text: Fantastic burgers. Great beer selection. Friendly staff. Very inviting space. Will be back with friends.

name: Champ Maxwell
text: Food was OK, service was not so good

name: Erica Howard
text: It was really good I enjoyed it!!!

name: John Langheim
text: Great crust.... wonderful toppings.... delightful service.

name: John Gillespie
text: Pizza is always very good. Service was great too.

name: Sherry Hibbert
text: Love it, but please make sure staff doesn't wear short shorts, unappetizing üòµ

name: Tyler Allen
text: Glad they opened another mellow here. Same as any mellow, expect to wait if you go at peak hours.

name: J B
text: Great food and prices. The staff was kind and very helpful in offering beer choices.

name: John Larrabee
text: A nice and stylish location, and lots of good beers, but I don't understand all the hype surrounding these pies. The ingredients are good quality no doubt, but nothing really to shout about.  My three topping pizza seemed as though the kitchen had applied the ingredients with a pair of tweezers - sparse!

name: eli g
text: Loved this place. Great service, great pizza! Highly recommended. The medium size pizza is huge! We had to pack the left overs and it was too much even for two meals. You will not be disappointed

name: Sam Taylor
text: Mellow Mushroom is literally the best pizza chain restaurant you will ever go to. Not only is their Pizza amazing, but their appetizers, and selection of beer is off the charts. The main draw of how good the pizza is for me is the dough ‚Ä¶More

name: Christy Wood
text: Great food Great staff Love this place!! And have the best sangria red wine!!! Which is now my favorite drink!!!!üòçüòçüòçüíóüíó

name: Scott Toussaint
text: Great pizza, great service. Solid reliable performer.

name: Elaine King
text: Loved the atmosphere of this place. Very roomy inside you have plenty of room to walk around the tables without anyone having to move. They also have seating outside with 2 cornhole games outside! The pizza is delicious by the way.

name: Christy Wood

name: Tyler Cannon
text: Highly recommend the bbq chicken pizza (skip the blue cheese and get the ranch)

name: Rebecca Ward
text: Very good vibes, good service. Great food!

name: Ricky H Duncan
text: Service and food was very good!

name: Cindy Tucker-Hipps
text: Great veggie pizza

name: Cynthia Linkenhoker
text: Always love this place. Fast service!!

name: reanna kelly
text: Great food and great service!

name: Carl Cady
text: Good pizza, staff and enjoyable atmosphere. More room than the old place they had down by the college but a little less nostalgic inside. Larger groups can be easily accomadated now. Entire bar for drinks and some patio seating on good days (and they open the doors).

name: LaMont Lamphier
text: Good, would go again. They were very busy and deserve another visit before making a judgement.

name: David Baruch
text: Pizza was good. And waitress by the name of Joe was very attentive, thank you for the great service.

name: P. Bell
text: Food is good for the price, just another themed restaurant chain. Service was pretty slow but worth it for the beer cheese

name: joseph vance
text: I will never go back to the one in Clemson. Ever again on top of waiting for the food 30 mins. And then they didn't bring it all out at the same time they brought one  and then 5 minutes later they brought another. That's when we noticed ‚Ä¶More

name: Entropy CC
text: We got the garlic cheese bread and a cheese pizza. It came quickly and service was good even though it was busy, but the food was just ok. The bread for the cheese bread wasn't very good and there wasn't much garlic. The pizza sauce is so mild that the whole pizza seemed bland. It definitely relies on toppings for flavor.

name: justin davis
text: Pizzas are delish. Good beers.

name: Matthew Deweese
text: Amazing place! I really like the new location and design. They have done a great job with it. The food was really good. The appetizers and pizza came out pretty quick once we were seated. We waited at the bar and had drinks while waiting for our table.

name: Jeanne Arkfeld
text: Delicious pizza, fun atmosphere,  friendly service. I will go back

name: Hannah Davis
text: Best pizza in Clemson!

name: Matthew Huller
text: We had the house special large pizza and it was good the staff was great

name: Shawn T
text: LOVED IT. Pizza and salad were DELICIOUS. Will  definitely  come back. Staff is  not really friendly but food is excellent

name: Sandra Smith
text: The MOST AMAZING SALADS AND PIZZA EVER!!  Delicious, Ice cold beer. Very prompt, courteous service and the Manager Alex even came around checking on everyone's experience.  Your life will be changed!

name: Dorothy Dillon
text: My order was ready when I got there!  Open area. Not as cramped as some mellow mushroom. Is load when crowded  staff was nice. Best pretzel knots in town

name: Liliana Cruz
text: Love this place.

name: David Taylor
text: Good food , great service

name: Mythicaldragon
text: It was vary good, but don't count on your drink getting refilled. (The service is poor)

name: Jeremy Ray
text: The last 3 times now that we've gone to Mellow Mushroom the service has been underwhelming and today's meal came out undercooked after a lengthy wait. The food was warmed up which took another 15 minutes somehow and was then burned. The ‚Ä¶More

name: yo Kenzo
text: Absolutely horrible. They brought the kids pizza in about 30 minutes, but it took over an hour more to get the adult pizza. They also have these terrible paper straws. I kind've feel bad for the servers because they have to repeat themselves due to thr loud noise in the building. Easy 2 star.

name: Joyce Freeman
text: We had the House Special. It was delicious! Plenty of seating, fast friendly service.

name: Justin H
text: I feel their coupon system should be updated. If a special is being ran  online but I am told it should not be running yet because football season hasnt started, how is it running online my fault?  Also, if i recieve a coupon for $10 off an ‚Ä¶More

name: Whittni Barnett
text: Pizza was delicious!! And I highly suggest the popsicle for a light, sweet dessert on a hot summer day. The salted caramel was yummy!! Kid friendly too

name: Erin Joye
text: So good

name: Nikki Moore
text: I have been wanting to go to Mellow Mushroom for a couple months now and every time something has come up. So finally it lined up I could take my boyfriend who has never been. When we got there we were seated at a table, but it wasn‚Äôt very ‚Ä¶More

name: Sandra Barnhart
text: Food was pretty good, our waitress seemed rushed to take our plates when we were still finishing but she was very pleasant.

name: Sam clent
text: I first want to say I never write a review, but today I must make an exception. I came in Sunday 3/24 at around 6/6:30. The restaurant was quite busy so I decided to sit at the bar. I noticed the bar was busy surprisingly I was promptly ‚Ä¶More

name: Jay Dawg
text: Pizza was hot and delicious and the soda was fresh!

name: Brenda Oglesby
text: Pizza was great. We got the chicken buffalo.not too hot. Perfect.Service was good also.

name: Bethany Moorefield
text: Pizza was delicious. Fun and funky environment!

name: Scott Dyar
text: Great food as always, service was OUT STANDING.

text: I'm so in love with Mellow Mushroom in Clemson SC! Great wait staff,and the food is great! Too bad they don't give you a bigger bowl of,the magic mushroom soup

name: Jeff Finley

text: I really enjoyed the pizza! It was super tasty.  The atmosphere was good too - not too noisy but not super quiet.

name: Kyree Mackey
text: Amazing! Wish there was one in Fort Walton, FL

text: This is one of my very favorite places!! The pizza, pretzel bites with beer cheese, and the stromboli is super fresh,hot and rocks every time!! The service is always fast and super friendly! The atmosphere is buzzing every visit! And it's always clean!! Thank you Mellow Mushroom by Clemson U!! We love you!!

name: Nikolay Kochkin
text: Wings are the best

name: Dmitriy Davydovich
text: Mellow mushroom ... a chain that tries to not feel like a chain. While the pizza is good for the price it isnt the best in town. The service is also on the slower side... get ready to spend 20 minutes just waiting for an appetizer and 10 ‚Ä¶More

name: Lou Torcivia
text: Great pizza, calzones and salads, as well as very  good beer selection. Fun atmosphere, but a bit loud. Lots of TVs to watch the game. Generally good service.

name: Aimee Gambrell
text: Some of their food is amazing and some of it isn't. I feel like the prices are decent for the amount of food that you get. My kids loved the kids menu. I had the cheese calzone, but it didn't have much flavor. Would have liked for it to ‚Ä¶More

name: Jimmy Scott
text: Always one of the best pizza places to go I had the Philly cheese steak hoagie and it was awesome i would recommend anything there but my advice get there early it fills up fast and the wait will be long

name: John Majsztrik
text: The service was great, and the pizza was good too. We went with friends that have gluten allergies and they were very accommodating. One of our pizzas came out with a big air bubble, but before they even put it down they said to start on ‚Ä¶More

name: K H
text: Build your own salad is my favorite . . .so many choices!!üòä

name: Linda Blackwell
text: Pleasant atmosphere delicious salad and pizza.

name: Xenaxia
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. Been to several locations and all was a great experience. Dakota was amazing and very friendly. He really took care of my hysband and I. It was ny husband's first visit and Dakota provided wonderful service and we will definitely come back again.

name: Debbi B
text: We enjoyed the newly opened Mellow Mushroom. An extensive menu...I wish there was a salad selection. The food was delicious and the staff very friendly. A little pricey for lunch.

name: Greg Sweet
text: This is the best pizza. The service in Clemson is awesome!

name: DOTTIE king
text: First time here and it was awesome. Great service great food and the wait was only 15 minutes.

name: Sheila James
text: I had the Ritz burger and the seasoned potatoes, both were very good. Also their tea was really good.

name: Cliff Smith
text: Awesome service from Sydney.  Food delicious!!

name: Sherri Sammons
text: Great pizza! Mighty Meaty is my family's favorite!

name: Andrew Pitman
text: I remember Mellow Mushroom being good in the past, especially for creative pizzas, but they've really upped their game recently. Good pizza, good appetizers, and an impressive beer selection.

name: Wade Patterson
text: Great pizza and has a full bar incase u want a margarita

name: Samuel Edwards
text: Awesome place with great service.

name: Reginald Wilkins
text: Great pizza and cheese sticks. Very pleasant staff as well

name: Robbie Joram
text: Good pizza and good service. Live music too!

name: Sailor Awesomeness
text: This pizza is so goooood. If you're really hungry for pizza. Come here. It can be pretty packed at night though. Well during lunch too on a good day.

name: Kristie Corn
text: The Mellow Mushroom was fantastic. Our waitress was excellent. I love the marinara sauce they put on the pizza. We also had garlic bread which was very good. I will go back if I ever pass through Clemson again.

name: Mitch Cheek

text: Great. Waiter Henson was awesome

name: Joe Davis
text: Food was very good. Price was not too bad. Always well taken care of.

name: April Roberts
text: Arrived at mellow mushroom in Clemson approximately 3pm today . Host greeted my family with a ‚Äú what could I do for you‚Äù I ask of here was a wait , she said no. So I ask could we have a table for 4people. ‚Ä¶More

name: Blake Greene
text: Cold beer, good pizza. What more could you want? Good trivia night on Thursdays, too

name: Kathy Nickell
text: Great pizza selection and friendly service

name: Triple Z
text: Good food and good friendly service but i order 2 drinks and had my waiter's hair in both off them

name: Megan barrow
text: This place has a variety of unique pizzas and even a few vegetarian options. The mushroom pizza is phenomenal it is so full of flavor a definite must try. It is a bit pricey for pizza but it is more than worth it.

name: Carolyn Alexander
text: Awesome pizza and best salad in town.

name: John Kinsey
text:
It was a typical college crowd:  noisy.
The food was excellent, the waitress charming and efficient!
The only reason for not getting a 5th star was that it was noisy.

name: gamble
text: This is the best pizza I have ever eaten at. I've been here 3 times in the last week and I suggest everyone try this place atleast once.

name: David Batson
text: Great pizza and incredible new building. The service time compared to the old location is MUCH improved. Get the mighty meaty pizza and you can thank me later. :)

name: Wilhelmenia Walker
text: Food is great... but the  servers they need help....they need  more training how to talk to people on the phone and to take oders Shame on you mellow mushroom....you new so you have time to improve....

name: Ben Webb
text: 420 G13 is a great beer... Get it

name: Jeffrey Bufton
text: The pizza is awesome. The service is ok. The place is not a fine quiet dining experience, meaning it is very loud and noisy if that is what you are looking for in your evening. Be careful to plan to go when there isn't anything special happening at Clemson University or you will wait.

name: Keith Chatham
text: Well worth the drive!! We try to visit at least weekly. Amazing pizza and awesome service!!

name: Janie Wilbanks
text: The food was wonderful. Nice and hot, smooth with the cheese, tasteful with all the ingredients. Cooked just perfect. Service great- smiling, knowledgeable, very helpful and well trained in their job.

name: Jason Callaway SC REALTOR
text: I started at the original one on Roswell Road in Sandy Springs. The atmosphere has become more modern ( no great fixtures or anything to look at), but the formula is still the same. Always love you, but you went the wrong way. Mellow mushroom the crazy life can be Down the Rabbit Whole and not some washed out version.

name: Valerie DeVries
text: WAYYYY better than first weeks.  They have worked out some kinks and hired/trained staff better.  Good food, friendly and more capable wait staff.  Lots of families and children on a Wednesday night, so very noisy, and a bit slow service (busy!).  My "small" salad could easily have been dinner!

name: Sean Bogue
text: Get some help mellow mushroom. Very busy place. Food was good. We got it to go, because they were so slammed.

name: Amy
text: I'm never disappointed in the quality and consistency of their food, and this is the second location I've been to. Their House Pizza is incredible! The manager even took the time to come around to make sure the food and service was up to our expectations which was greatly appreciated.

name: Nicki Mount

name: Sandra Worthington
text: Good was delicious and dthe service quick and friendly. Great beers as well!

name: Niles Fowler
text: These are my people they are great

name: Joel Kidd
text: Great crust, cheese, and seasonings. I'm a little disappointed that they were out of basil, and make the "great white" pizza without it. Glad that it returned to town.  The new place hasm more room.  Still starts to get pretty full between 6 to 6:30pm.

name: Derek Vaughn
text: Mighty meaty is so good.

name: Jack Queener
text:
Always Excellent!
No wait at lunch today.

name: Jeff Alderman
text: Great pizza and calzones!

name: Susy H
text: Fabulous service! Amazing food! Very comfortable space!

name: candy Cerqua
text: Wow this place is Fantastic..The service and waitress were Awsome.We'll be Back.

text: Food was not as good as I expected. The green peppers on the pizza my fiance and I ordered were hard and plainly not cooked on the pizza. Also there were numerous gnats flying around... Yuck! Wont be back here again... Anderson location is better.

name: Denise Beckmann
text: Best Mellow Mushroom visited. Generous salads. Pizza cust was perfect.  Ready for large groups during lunch.

name: Ashleigh Boyette
text: Great spot with awesome decor right in the heart of Clemson! Much better location than where it was previously. Great service, same great food, awesome decor.

name: Josh Morgan
text: Decor is nice, seating is post-industrial, so not entirely comfortable. With a new location, I can expect some mistakes. They thankfully fixed my rough dough calzone and offered an apology. Good with me. ‚Ä¶More

text: Nice atmosphere and great food.

name: Pat Gosnell
text: Almost as good as it used to be. The crust wasn't as crispy on the bottom as I remember, but it was still pretty good. Very noisy building though... needs some sound dampening.

text:
Over-priced pizza and a "fair-only" tap selection.
